static member Create : string * System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection * int * System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode * System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions * int * int * System.IO.Pipes.PipeSecurity * System.IO.HandleInheritability * System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights -> System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream
MemberSignature.Usage: System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStreamAcl.Create (pipeName, direction, maxNumberOfServerInstances, transmissionMode, options, inBufferSize, outBufferSize, pipeSecurity, inheritability, additionalAccessRights)

param.name: direction
param.span: 确定管道方向的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.

param.name: maxNumberOfServerInstances
param.span: 共享同一名称的服务器实例的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of server instances that share the same name.
You can pass for this value.

param.name: transmissionMode
param.span: 确定管道传输模式的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that determines the transmission mode of the pipe.

param.name: options
param.span: 确定如何打开或创建管道的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.

param.name: pipeSecurity
param.span: 一个对象，确定管道的访问控制和审核安全性。

span.span: An object that determines the access control and audit security for the pipe.

param.name: inheritability
param.span: 确定基础句柄能否由子进程继承的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle can be inherited by child processes.

param.name: additionalAccessRights
param.span: 枚举值之一，指定管道的访问权限。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rights of the pipe.

summary.span: 使用指定的管道名称、管道方向、最大数量的服务器实例、传输模式、管道选项、建议的输入输出缓冲区大小、管道安全性、继承模式和管道访问权限创建 类的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified pipe name, pipe direction, maximum number of server instances, transmission mode, pipe options, recommended in and out buffer sizes, pipe security, inheritability mode, and pipe access rights.

returns.span: 新的命名管道服务器流实例。

span.span: A new named pipe server stream instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `options` 包含 ，则将忽略传递的， `pipeSecurity` 并 使用 分配给当前 Windows 用户的自定义实例，并将其作为仅具有对管道的完全控制的唯一所有者来创建。If `options` contains , the passed `pipeSecurity` is ignored and the returned object is created using a custom instance assigned to the current Windows user as its only owner with full control of the pipe.

exception.span: 不是有效数字：应大于或等于 1 且小于或等于 254，否则应设置为 的值。

span.span: is not a valid number: it should be greater than or equal to 1 and less than or equal to 254, or should be set to the value of .
